languages.text: {n}На лице Маражая расплывается довольная улыбка — которую он тут же прячет за наигранно склоненной головой.{/n} "Я не разочарую тебя, {name}".
{n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Маражая расплывается довольная улыбка — которую он тут же прячет за наигранно склоненной головой.{/n} "Я не разочарую тебя, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."
{n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."
{n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."
{n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上露出了满意的微笑，随后以表演般的方式低下了头，将笑意隐藏起来。{/n}“我绝不会让你失望，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上露出了满意的微笑，随后以表演般的方式低下了头，将笑意隐藏起来。{/n}“我绝不会让你失望，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}満足げな笑みがマラズハイの顔に広がり、彼は即座にそれを仰々しい一礼をもって隠す。{/n}「失望はさせんよ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}満足げな笑みがマラズハイの顔に広がり、彼は即座にそれを仰々しい一礼をもって隠す。{/n}「失望はさせんよ、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa satisfecha cruza el rostro de Marazhai, que la oculta rápidamente con una ostentosa reverencia.{/n} «No te decepcionaré, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa satisfecha cruza el rostro de Marazhai, que la oculta rápidamente con una ostentosa reverencia.{/n} «No te decepcionaré, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Sur le visage de Marazhai se dessine un sourire satisfait qu'il s'empresse de dissimuler en baissant la tête pour vous adresser une révérence de façade.{/n} « Je ne vous décevrai pas, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sur le visage de Marazhai se dessine un sourire satisfait qu'il s'empresse de dissimuler en baissant la tête pour vous adresser une révérence de façade.{/n} « Je ne vous décevrai pas, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Ein zufriedenes Lächeln huscht über Marazhais Gesicht – ein Lächeln, das er umgehend verbirgt, indem er seinen Kopf zu einer übertriebenen Verbeugung neigt.{/n} "Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deinen Worte lassen Marazhai erstarren – sofort senkt er den Kopf, als würde er zeigen wollen, wie gehorsam er ist.{/n} "Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne tatmin olmuş bir gülümseme yayılsa da rolüne yakışır bir şekilde diz çökerken başını eğiyor ve onu saklamayı başarıyor.{/n} "Seni hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}A satisfied smile spreads across Marazhai's face — which he immediately hides by dropping his head in a performative bow.{/n} "I will not disappoint you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne tatmin olmuş bir gülümseme yayılsa da rolüne yakışır bir şekilde diz çökerken başını eğerek onu anında saklamayı başarıyor.{/n} "Seni hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım {name}."
